internationalizations.title: Wedding planner
internationalizations.description:
A wedding planning website to book and manage your wedding functions.
The technologies used are :
  • java
  • Spring boot
  • Angular
  • PostgreSQL

internationalizations.title: CalcZeta - A programming language Interpreter
internationalizations.description:
An interpreter for CalcZeta programming language written in Java.
The technologies used are :
  • java

internationalizations.title: ToDo app using Java
internationalizations.description:
A Java spring MVC based app to create and manage your work in form of todo's.
The technologies used are :
  • java
  • Spring MVC
  • BootStrap
  • HTML
  • MySQL

internationalizations.title: Microservice Architecture demonstration
internationalizations.description:
Microservice architecture –structural style – arranges an application as a collection of loosely coupled services which are fine-grained and the protocols are lightweight.
The technologies used are :
  • java
  • Spring boot
  • Eureka Server
